/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the towering buildings that line the street. These structures, predominantly gray and white, rise high into the clear blue sky, punctuated by a few wispy clouds. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and trucks moving along it, their colors muted under the bright sunlight. Buildings on either side of the street add to the urban atmosphere, their windows reflecting the world around them. In the distance, construction cranes can be seen, a testament to the city's continuous growth and development. The image is a snapshot of life in a modern city, where tradition and progress coexist.
